head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORSE, ELIZABETH ANN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORSE, ELIZABETH ANN

block.p: MORSE-Elizabeth Ann. Fifty-four, of Lake Forest, IL, August 26, 2000. Wife of Alan Morse; mother of Melissa (Michael) Albright, Jennifer (Joseph) Iudice, and Andrew Morse; grandmother of Jack, Riley, Sadie, and Jacob. Sister of John Burke. Visitation 7:00 P.M to 9:00 P.M. Wednesday August 30, at Wenban Funeral Home, 320 E. Vine Avenue, Lake Forest, IL. Memorial service 11:00 A.M. Thursday, August 31, at Lake Forest Cemetery, N. Lake Road, Lake Forest. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to Lustgarten Foundation for Pancreatic Cancer Research, 111 Stewart Ave, Bethpage, NY 11714. Info 847-234-0022
